author: gstein
msg: Add new API for opening many admin databases at once.

author: julianfoad
msg: Add an API for getting details of the tree conflict on a particular victim.

author: ivan
msg: Move Windows SSL server trust provider to win32_crypto.c.

author: gstein
msg: We require a minimum of SQLite 3.5, so the sqlite_threadsafe() function
will always be present (no need to test at configure time).
Add version checking for the case of configuring against a non-pkg version
Recommend 3.5.9 rather than the latest (3.6.2) since the latter does not
have a "recommended for production use" on it yet. Allow the 3.6.x series
* build/ac-macros/sqlite.m4: add version checking for non-pkg installs.
use regex rather than glob syntax. stop checking for the
* configure.ac: recommend 3.5.9. switch from glob to regex format.
